question: 叔母
sourceMnemonic: An <kanji>aunt</kanji> on your <kanji>mother</kanji>'s side is still your <vocabulary>aunt</vocabulary>. This aunt always has to be younger than her though.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for this word is an exception. But you already learned the <ja>伯母</ja> which means aunt too. Well they have the same reading! So if you know one aunt, you know them all!
